mean_cn: n.杠杆；控制杆；施加影响的手段；  v.用杠杆移动；撬开
mean_en: a long piece of wood, metal, etc. used for lifting or opening something by somebody placing one end of it under an object and pushing down on the other end
sentence: I can move the earth with a lever.
sentence_trans: 给我一根杠杆，我能撬动地球。
word_etyma: lev举起 + er表名词，物 → 举起［重东西］的东西 → 杠杆
